response.original_title: Just the Facts: World History: Egypt
response.overview: Egypt, the home of awe-inspiring monuments and treasures, comes to life in this comprehensive video journey through one of the oldest civilizations in the world. EGYPT takes you through Egypts history, geography, customs and culture like no other video can. Explore the Sphinx, and the temple of King Ramses II built by ancient Egyptian architects over 4,500 years ago. From the barren cities like Cairo and Alexandria its all here in EGYPT.
response.title: Just the Facts: World History: Egypt
